article_title: Tampa pastor honored for carrying on predecessor’s legacy
article_text: The Rev. Anthony White and his wife Sonia sing along during a program at a luncheon for the reverand at Rusty Pelican on Saturday. White took over Bible Based Fellowship Church in Northdale after the death of its renowned pastor Arthur Jones. ANDY JONES/STAFF

article_metadata.Description: TAMPA — Rev. Anthony White had big shoes to fill when he started his new job last summer.

White took over Bible Based Fellowship Church in Northdale after the death of its renowned pastor Arthur Jones.
Anthony White and his wife Sonia sing along during a program at a luncheon for the reverand at Rusty Pelican on Saturday.
